answers.answer: Go to your OBED its labor and delivery. They will check you for preeclampsia. My mother in law had it when she was pregnant with my husband and didn't know it,  it turned into toxemia which caused her to have a seizure and had my huh us and 9 weeks premature. Definitely don't want to mess around with preeclampsia.
